title: Naruto Box Set 1: Volumes 1-27
description: Naruto is a ninja-in-training with a need for attention, a knack for mischief, and sealed within him, a strange, formidable power. His antics amuse his instructor Kakashi and irritate his teammates, intense Sasuke and witty Sakura, but Naruto is serious about becoming the greatest ninja in the village of Konohagakure All 27 volumes of manga featuring the first Naruto story arc are included (time passes between vol. 27 and 28 and the characters are visibly older) 3 volumes are available 1 month early in this box set (December's releases-volumes 25-27) Limited production run of 5,000 makes this a serious collectible Quality wooden display box Self-merchandising outer shipper Includes attractive premium items:- Mini-Manga of the "proto chapter," the first NARUTO story ever published- Exclusive 2-Sided color poster- Collectible graphic novel cover stickers- NARUTO Trading Card Game card, exclusive to VIZ Media
author: Masashi Kishimoto
